description:
Explore and navigate the world with confidence using Google Maps. Find the best routes with live traffic data and real-time GPS navigation for driving, walking, cycling and public transport. Discover over 250 million businesses and places – from restaurants and shops to everyday essentials – with photos, reviews and helpful information.

Navigate the world, the way that you want:
• Get to where you need to go with fuel-efficient route options
• Find the best route with real-time, turn-by-turn voice and on-screen navigation
• Save time with automatic rerouting based on live traffic, incidents and road closures
• Catch the bus, train and ride-share effortlessly, with real-time updates
• Find bike or scooter rentals to get around more easily

Plan trips and experiences effortlessly:
• Preview an area before you go (e.g. parking, entrances) with Street View
• Use Immersive View to experience what landmarks, parks and routes look like, and even check the weather so that you can be ready in advance
• Create custom lists of your favourite saved places and share with others
• Order delivery and takeaway, make reservations and book hotels
• Don't get lost with offline maps in an area with bad signal
• Search for local places and things to do, and decide based on user reviews and photos

Discover and explore like a local:
• Explore with confidence knowing 500 million users contribute and keep the map up to date each year
• Avoid the crowds by seeing how busy a place is before you get there
• Use Lens in Maps to see walking directions overlaid on the real world
• Filter restaurants by cuisine, hours, price, rating and more
• Ask questions about a place, from dishes to parking, and get quick answers

Some features not available in all countries or cities
Navigation isn't intended to be used by oversized or emergency vehicles

Know what's ahead on the road with the help from other drivers. Waze is a live map that harnesses the local knowledge of tens of millions of drivers around the world. Drivers safely and confidently reach their everyday destinations thanks to Waze map’s GPS navigation, live traffic updates, real-time safety alerts (including roadworks, accidents, crashes, police, potholes and more) and accurate ETAs.


Make your next drive more predictable and stress-free:
• Get there faster with real-time directions, accurate ETAs and automatic rerouting based on live traffic, incidents and road closures
• Even if you know the way, avoid surprises on the road ahead with safety alerts for accidents, crashes, roadworks, objects on the road, potholes, speed bumps, sharp curves, bad weather, emergency vehicles, railway crossings and more
• Steer clear of tickets by knowing where police and red light and speed cameras are located
• Share what’s happening on the road with other drivers by reporting live incidents and hazards
• Stay informed of upcoming speed limit changes, and keep your speedometer in check
• Know which lane to be in with multi-lane guidance
• See toll pricing and choose to avoid tolls along your routes
• Add road passes and vignettes for HOV lanes and restricted traffic zones
• Find petrol/fuel stations and prices and EV charging stations along your route
• Locate car parks near your destination
• Use voice-guided turn-by-turn navigation from a variety of languages, local accents and your favourite celebrities
• Plan your next drive by checking ETAs by future departure or arrival times
• Use your favourite audio apps (for podcasts, music, news, audiobooks) directly within Waze
• Sync Waze to your car’s built-in display through Apple CarPlay


* Some features are not available in all countries


* Waze navigation is not intended for emergency or oversized vehicles


You can manage your in-app Waze privacy settings at any time. Learn more about the Waze privacy policy here, www.waze.com/legal/privacy.

Travel confidently around London with Transport for London's official app, built around our iconic live Tube map. Try switching to step-free mode and watch the map adjust to show only accessible stations, ensuring your journeys are as smooth as possible. With a clear, user-friendly design, TfL Go is easy for everyone to use.

Find the Best Route
We'll suggest multiple ways to get to your destination, whether by Tube, London Overground, Elizabeth line, DLR, Tram, National Rail, IFS Cloud Cable Car, or even cycling and walking. You choose the route that suits you best.

Check Before You Travel
Get live arrival times for Buses, Tube, London Overground, Elizabeth Line, DLR, Tram, and National Rail. Check the live status of all TfL lines and stations directly on the map, or view a summary of current disruptions in the "Status" section.

Freedom to Explore
Find travel options tailored to your needs, including step-free journeys and routes avoiding stairs or escalators. Journey plans automatically adapt to the accessibility status of stations, helping you avoid disruptions. TfL Go also supports VoiceOver and Dynamic Type, making it more accessible for everyone.

Manage Your Payments
Create an account or log in to manage your payments for travel across London. Top up pay as you go credit or purchase Travelcards for your Oyster card, and view your journey history for both Oyster and contactless cards registered to your account.

Note: Oyster and contactless accounts can only be accessed within UK/Europe.

Understand Station Facilities
Check how busy a station is right now, or see if it has toilets or Wi-Fi access. Find detailed information about step-free access and interchanges including platform gap width, step height and boarding methods available.

What People Are Saying:
"...a surprisingly phenomenal app for commuters travelling via public transport in London!"
"One of the finest transport apps there is, well thought out, well designed and well executed."
"The most accurate app in London for bus times"
"Fantastic app if only just to have a live Tube map / bus tracker in your pocket at all times!"
"TfL Go is your number one stop for live tube and bus arrivals"

Get in Touch
Any questions, feedback or something we've missed? Email us at tflappfeedback@tfl.gov.uk

what3words is an easy way to identify precise locations. Every 3m square has been given a unique combination of three words: a what3words address. Now you can find, share and navigate to precise locations using three simple words.

Use what3words to:
- Help emergency services know exactly where to find you
- Plan exact meet-up locations
- Tell car breakdown services where you are
- Navigate to any destination easily
- Save your favourite memorable spots – a viewpoint, waterfall or proposal location
- Save key work locations, from incident reporting to delivery entrances
- Help people find your business or Airbnb
- Guide people to accessible entrances.

what3words addresses are accepted by over 85% of UK emergency services as well as the AA, and many UK delivery companies. Businesses and hotels display what3words on their contact pages, and booking confirmations –  anywhere you would normally find location information.

Popular features:
- Find your current what3words address offline
- Compatible with navigation apps including Apple Maps and Google Maps
- Save your favourite locations and categorise them into lists
- AutoSuggest prompts you with intelligent suggestions
- Available in over 60 languages
- Navigate offline with compass mode
- Add a what3words address to a photo

If you experience any problems or have any questions, email us at support@what3words.com

EULA: https://what3words.com/terms

Join Shell GO+ Rewards today and get £2.50 worth of points!*
It is now easy to save on fuel, charging, food and drinks.

To earn points and rewards, simply scan your digital card in the Shell App when you buy fuel, charge your electric vehicle (EV) at Shell Recharge and purchase selected in-store products at participating Shell service stations.*

Members can exchange their points for savings on fuel, food, drinks and partner e-gift cards. 

Plus, enjoy exclusive member benefits that makes every journey more rewarding.
Benefits:
•Save on fuel: Exchange your points for fuel discounts.
•Save on charging: Save 10p per kWh when using the Shell App to charge with Shell Recharge or for just £9.99 per month join our Shell Recharge Subscription and enjoy 30% off standard app pricing (up to 1,000 kWh/month).
•Free hot drinks: Buy 7 hot drinks and get your next hot drink free. 
•Discounts: Get 10% on our deli by Shell food range, Shell Helix engine oils and Car wash.
•Surprise freebies: including discounts on fuel and food every now and then as our way of saying thank you. 
•Partner offers: Benefit from our exclusive partner offers. 

Pay at Pump: 

Save time and enjoy the convenience of making your payment directly at the pump – ideal if you have small children or pets in the car.  
•Enter Pump Number: Confirm the pump number on the Shell app.
•Select Payment: Choose your payment method and pre-authorisation limit, and apply any fuel rewards. 
• Start Fuelling: Fill up and then drive off. It’s that simple.

Find your local Shell service station:

Discover petrol stations and EV charging points tailored just for you using the Shell App Service Station Locator. Whether you need fuel or to charge your EV, a car wash, or a quick snack, we’ve got you covered.
Explore service stations that offer Shell V-Power Diesel and Unleaded for that extra engine kick!


Begin your EV journey with Shell Recharge:

We're with you for the journey – wherever and whenever you need to recharge.
Charging is effortless and smooth with the Shell App and charge card. Use the navigator features to locate one of the many 600,000 public charging points in the large network spanning across 33 European countries. You can always find a charger that fits your criteria with the easy-to-use and smart filtering options. 
Key features:
•Plan your journey
•Save 10p per kWh when you charge with the Shell App and earn rewards with Shell GO+ Rewards or for just £9.99 per month join our Shell Recharge Subscription and enjoy 30% off standard app pricing (up to 1,000 kWh/month).
•Simple pricing and payment
•Extras, e.g personalisation and promotions to explore
 
*T&Cs apply, visit www.shell.co.uk/shellgoplustc. Participating Shell service stations and Shell Recharge branded charge points only. Shell Recharge On Street is excluded. New members will receive £2.50 worth of points when joining and opting into marketing communications.

Instantly compare your travel options in real-time across all transport modes globally, with live departures and bus locations!

Easily navigate your area with turn-by-turn directions for all your public transport, walking, cycling and scooter trips. 

THOUSANDS OF 5 STAR REVIEWS

* "Life changing. This app really changes the way you travel."
* "The only true five star app."
* "BEST TRANSPORT APP EVER."
* "It's become a weird and possibly sad fact of my life that waiting and receiving Citymapper updates have overtaken Christmases and birthdays on the anticipation and excitometer."

FIND THE BEST ROUTE ► Simple trip planning combining all transport modes: bus, tube, train, tram, ferry, cabs, rideshare, carshare, bike hire, e-scooters and walking. Discover routes you never knew existed

HIT THE GO BUTTON FOR STEP-BY-STEP DIRECTIONS ► Turn-by-turn navigation for all your transport, walking, personal cycling, bike shares and scooter trips. Choose between 3 different map views, see the charge levels of e-bikes around you, we even help you avoid no-parking zones. We take care of the logistical thinking so you are free to enjoy the ride

BEAT THE RUSH HOUR CROWD ► Live wait times and ETA so you'll never miss a bus, train or tram again. Follow your bus / train as it's approaching on a real-time map, see the best carriage to board, get alerted when it's time to get off, and get in and out from the best exit at any underground / train station 

PERSONALISE YOUR APP ► Save Home, Work and your go-to stops or stations for lightning fast trip planning. Subscribe to your favourite tube, train, bus or tram line for automatic disruption, delay, and status alerts

GET SOCIAL ► Share your live trip: let friends follow your live trip to know when you'll arrive. Share any location or address: one tap for others to get directions

TRAVEL OFFLINE ► Access offline the official TfL underground map and many other local network maps

EXPERIENCE ONE-STOP-SHOP MOBILITY ► Compare cab fares, hail a ride, grab the closest carshare, hop on a shared bike all from within the app. Our partners include: Uber, Gett, Zipcar, Ola, Getaround, FREENOW, LIME, Santander Cycles, Forest, Beryl, Anywheel

COVERAGE ► London and the South East | Birmingham and the Midlands | Manchester | Liverpool | Yorkshire | Edinburgh | Dublin | Paris | New York | Singapore | Taiwan | Hong Kong | Los Angeles | Barcelona | Berlin | Rome | Madrid | Hamburg | Milan | Stockholm | Chicago | Toronto | Sydney + many more in the UK worldwide!

PUBLIC TRANSPORT AGENCIES ► We use open data from public transport agencies including:

UK WIDE | National Rail, Arriva, Stagecoach, First bus
LONDON | TfL (Transport for London), Underground, Overground, Docklands Light Railway (DLR), Tramlink 
MANCHESTER | TfGM (Transport for Greater Manchester), Manchester Metrolink 
LIVERPOOL | Merseytravel, Merseyrail
YORKSHIRE | WYCA (West Yorkshire Combined Authority), SYPTE (South Yorkshire Public Transport Executive), Sheffield Supertram
WEST MIDLANDS | TfWM (Transport for West Midlands), West Midlands Railway, Midland Metro, National Express West Midlands, National Express Coventry, Travel Telford, Worcestershire County Council, Diamond Bus
NOTTINGHAM | NCT, NET
EDINBURGH | TfE, Lothian Bus, Edinburgh Tram
GLASGOW | SPT
BRISTOL | Travelwest, MetroBus, Bristol Ferries
CARDIFF | Transport for Wales, Cardiff Bus
NEWCASTLE | NEXUS, Tyne and Wear Metro
BRIGHTON | Brighton & Hove Buses
DUBLIN | TFI, NTA, Bus Éireann, Dublin Bus, Iarnród Éireann (Irish Rail)
HONG KONG | MTR, HK Tramways, Light Rail, Kowloon Motor Bus, Citybus, First Bus, First Ferry, Star Ferry, Discovery Bay Ferry & Bus, Park Island Ferry & Bus, Green Mini Bus
SINGAPORE | LTA, SMRT, SBS

KEEP IN TOUCH ► Questions, feedback or something we have missed in your city? Email us at support@citymapper.com

Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/Citymapper
Visit our website: http://citymapper.com

app_name: BPme: Pay for Fuel in Your Car
description:
Download the new BPme app now and make your journey more rewarding with BPme Rewards.

Earn points: With BPme Rewards, you can earn points on every fuel and shop purchase. You can also review your points balance and receive personalised offers from within the app. Paying in-store? BPme gives you access to your digital BPme Rewards card right in the app, which can be scanned in-store to earn points on your purchases.

Redeem rewards: Treat yourself and redeem your points in-store on your fuel or shop purchases, or online for digital vouchers from our amazing partners!
Pay for fuel: BPme also lets you pay for fuel from the comfort of your car at supporting bp stations nationally. Our handy station finder will let you find the nearest bp station to you*.

Set up your payment method: Simply load your preferred payment card securely onto your phone - BPme supports Visa, MasterCard, American Express and BP Plus Fuel Cards with more payment types being added all the time.

Fill up your tank: Drive up, enter the pump number and confirm your payment method and how much you want to fill. Briefly wait for the pump to unlock before getting out of the car to fill up. When you have finished fuelling, you can get on your way.

Keep track of transactions: Once you have filled up, your transaction summary will show in the app and VAT invoice will be emailed to you. You can also look up previous purchases in your transaction history.

Download BPme now to get started!

*Please note BPme requires location services to be activated on your mobile device when using the app. This is to allow BPme to help you find the nearest station, and to pay for fuel when at a bp. We will only use your location when BPme is running and where you have given us permission to do so via the phone’s operating system.

Charge your EV with confidence.

Choose from the widest range of public charge points whether you’re near home or further afield with the UK’s most comprehensive charge point map. Find the right charger for you, filtering by power, connector type and availability, with pricing information in the app. Plus, you can pay through the app in seconds at thousands of charge points nationwide. 

Find nearby EV charging point details including types of chargers available, the cost of charging, and whether the charge point is available to use.

Use the route planner to see where to stop on longer routes, what's available in those areas, and how long you’ll need to charge.

Connect with our engaged community of drivers to better understand the charging world, or help others on their EV journey.

Pay for your charging sessions in the app using Zap-Pay. 

Keep track of the status of your charging session in real time.

Get more with a Zapmap subscription - if you regularly charge on the public network, Zapmap Premium could be the perfect partner:

Get discounts on your charge when you pay with Zap-Pay.

Find the cheapest, most reliable charge points and avoid queuing with filters for price, user-rating and multiple chargers. Plus, see the newest devices in your area with the new devices filter. 

Get Zapmap on your in-car dashboard via Apple CarPlay. Locate suitable charge points, view live charge point status and access route plans - all while on the move.

With over 1.5 million downloads, we’ve built a thriving community of EV drivers, sharing tips, and charging with confidence… and we can’t wait to welcome you too.
 
Love Zapmap? 
https://twitter.com/zap_map 
https://www.facebook.com/pages/Zap-Map/
https://www.linkedin.com/company/zap-map/

Any Suggestions? 
Contact us with issues or features suggestions on support@zap-map.com

Our Terms & Conditions - https://www.zap-map.com/terms-and-conditions
Our Privacy Policy - https://www.zap-map.com/privacy-notice

UK Live Bus Times & Timetables from stops in England, Scotland & Wales
* Over 5M downloads!
* In the App Store Top Free Apps for Navigation

London Live Bus Countdown tells you when your next bus will arrive at any bus stop in London & UK using the timing data directly from TfL and other city bus operators.

NEW
- Stops in England, Scotland and Wales
- Updated design with improved performance
- Support for Dynamic Type
- My Routes (previously My Buses) can feature tube stops
- Edinburgh (Scotland) Live Bus Times
- Dark Mode
- Bus Routes are mapped out for you on the bus times screen
- See Line Status information for the upcoming weekend or any day in the future
- Enter a Bus registration number to see its route and live arrival times
- Resume your journey if you quit the app without an internet connection
- Timetables: See bus timetable information at any bus stop.

* Line Status: Bus Routes, Tube & Rail
* Live Cams: View live video from TfL Traffic Cams
* Santander Cycles: Find your nearest docking stations and view live cycle and free space counts
* Improved Accessibility: Give us your feedback so we can improve
* My Routes Feature lets all the bus & tube times that matter to you on one screen.
* Redesigned Bus Stops screen - Nearest / Favourites / Recents on one page
* Travel Status Updates
* Phone Snatch Safety Alerts - Please note messages from the Metropolitan Police Service about phone snatch are available in selected locations only on a trial basis.
* Journey Planner - Find the best route to your destination and avoid delays
* Instantly tell when your bus is due
* Finds bus stops near you using your iPhone's GPS Location
* Oyster Balance Viewer
* Journey Planner
* Travel Status Bus, Tube & National Rail Disruption Updates - See alerts on your most used lines
* Hold down anywhere on the map to see the nearest bus stops to that area
* Live Bus times for Transport for London (TFL) bus stops showing when the next buses will arrive.
* Bus stops on the map show the direction the buses are heading
* Automatic Refresh of Bus Times Countdown so your list is always up to date
* Search for bus stops by postcode or bus stop name
* Displays Bus Stop Notices eg: Closures/Diversions/Disruptions Notices
* Save your favourite bus stops in your Favourites for quick access.
* Road Traffic News - Bus Route Disruptions


Please be aware that this app requires an internet connection and location services turned on for full functionality.

* This app uses the Bus Countdown feed from TfL and other data providers, who occasionally perform maintenance on their data feed, in which case the application will show no/incorrect results. We cannot be held responsible for any unavailability or inaccuracies displayed by this app.

SUBSCRIPTION DETAILS

- This app may offer monthly to annual subscriptions
- Payment will be charged to your Apple ID Account at confirmation of purchase
- Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
- Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase
- Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period
- You can cancel your subscription at any time, but please note that you will not get a refund for any remaining period of a subscription
- Users may be offered a free trial of the subscription
- Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription


END-USER LICENSE AGREEMENT

https://mobicia.com/terms/

HAVE QUESTIONS?

We always welcome your questions, suggestions and comments. Contact us 24/7 at support@mobicia.com

Île-de-France Mobilités is here to assist you daily. Purchase a digital ticket, recharge your Navigo pass, search for routes including trains, RERs, metros, trams, buses, coaches, bicycles, Vélib', car-sharing, or car rentals. Find schedules in real-time or traffic information... Discover essential tools and information for organizing your travels in Île-de-France. Together, let's travel with ease.

Avoid queues at stations: buy your transport tickets from your iPhone!
The following tickets are available for purchase:

- Metro-Train tickets or Bus-Tram Ticket
- One Way from/to Airports (you cannot purchase this ticket if you already have a Metro-Train Ticket charged on your device)
- Navigo daily (this fare doesn’t permit you to go to airports), weekly, or monthly passes
- Special fares (Anti-pollution pass, Paris-Visit Passes etc.)
- Daily Vélib’ passes

Purchased tickets can then be (depending on the chosen purchasing path):

- Stored on the iPhone and validated directly at stations (from iPhone Xr and iOS 17.5)
- Loaded onto your Navigo pass (from an iPhone 7, with at least iOS 13. iPhone XR and XS are compatible starting from iOS 14.5)

For compatible tickets (Metro-Train and Bus-Tram Tickets, Navigo Day passes, special fares), no account is needed, and you can pay directly with Apple Pay!

You can prepare and plan your travels:

- Find nearby bus stops, train stations, and metro stations
- Search for real-time public transport routes, car-sharing, and bicycle routes
- Save upcoming trips in your phone’s calendar
- Check the next departures for your lines in real-time and all the timetable information
- View maps of public transport networks (accessible even offline)
- Follow pedestrian routes for walking segment

Stay informed and anticipate disruptions:

- Check your lines’ Twitter feed for real-time traffic updates
- Get alerts for disruptions on your favorite lines and routes
- Stay updated on the status of elevators in the stations you use

Customize your travel:

- Save your destinations (work, home, gym, etc.), stations, and stops as favorites
- Customize your profile (fast walker, with difficulties, reduced mobility, etc.)
- Select lines or stations to avoid

Prefer soft or alternative modes of transport:

- Book car-sharing and/or ride-sharing trips in partnership with leading providers
- Opt for bicycle routes for all your trips
- Rent a car or a van for a short period by choosing a Communauto car-sharing vehicle from a wide selection of stations around you and book it immediately for the duration of your choice.
--
Already using the Île-de-France Mobilités app and enjoying its services? Let us know with a 5-star rating!
Experiencing bugs or having feedback to give? Help us improve by sending your suggestions through the contact form available via the personal space.

Hi, we’re Pod. One of the UK’s leading providers of EV charging. Welcome to our new and improved Pod Point app – the app that powers more than 5 million miles, every day.

The Pod Point app serves all your public, workplace or home charge needs – all in one place.

With the Pod Point app, you can:

- Top up your EV while shopping or at the office
- Track your charging activity and energy consumption, both at home and on our public charging network in the stats tab
- Manage your power at home through solar or the grid
- Take advantage of low tariff hours by setting schedules

Remember, you can still collect Clubcard points when charging with us. Simply connect your Tesco Clubcard in the app to collect 1 Tesco Clubcard point for every £1 spent on charging using a Pod Point charger at Tesco stores.

Alongside a brand-new look and feel, we’ve got some serious technical upgrades. We’ve heard your feedback and been working to improve the EV charging experience.
But we aren’t done yet! Keep your eyes open for updates that will make EV charging as easy as possible.

Ready for better EV charging?

This is Octopus Electroverse, the UK & Europe’s largest EV charging network.
It will change how you charge on the go.

—

Access over 1,000,000 chargers with the all-powerful and award-winning Electroverse app and Electrocard. The Electrocard (RFID) is free to order & you can do this through the Electroverse app whenever you like. 

One app. One card. One place for your charging needs.
This is public EV charging made simple.

‘But I’m not an Octopus customer!’ we hear you cry - well, good news, you don’t need to be with Octopus Energy to use Electroverse - it’s open to all!

What’s more, paywalls and hidden fees aren’t our thing - we’re more ‘discounts and inclusivity’. So, once you’ve signed up, you’ll have access to every feature immediately. 

You’ll also only ever get clear and transparent pricing from us. We never mark up charging rates, directly passing through the rate we receive from the relevant network. This also means we’re able to wrangle some discounted deals, so you can start saving on your favourite charging networks.

We’ll see you in the Electroverse soon.

——

App features include:

- Plunge Pricing discounts = On top of our standard discounts, we’ve rolled out Plunge Pricing: discounts when energy prices drop. Green energy = greener discounts.
- Electroverse map toggle = Switches map visibility between all chargers and those compatible with Electroverse. This means you have all the information when selecting a charger.
- Map filters = Search and find charging stations via charging speeds, socket types and preferred networks.
- Detailed Charger Information = Shows live charger availability, a renewable energy icon to help you charge with 100% green energy, and important location details (such as charging costs and other parking restrictions).
- In-app charging = Charge your vehicle via the app! Simply plug in and tap 'start charge' on your phone.
- Route planner = Energise your drive with plotted charging stops along any route! Makes driving long distances a piece of cake.
- Pay, your way = Debit card, Apple Pay, & more. It’s all your choice.

——

Winners of:

- Best EV Charging App (2025) -  E-mobility Awards
- Mobile Innovation of the Year (2024) - National Technology Awards
- Best EV charging app (2023) - AutoExpress Awards
- EV charging and app development (2022) - E-mobility Awards

Moovit is one app for all your urban mobility and transport rides!

Dailymail - "This travel app is a godsend for anyone using public transport – with live updates to bus schedules, as well as a great route-planner for cities across the UK."

Transportation is an integral part of urban living. Whether you ride the train, subway/underground /tube, bus, light rail, ferry or metro, use bikes, ride-sharing like Uber, getting the best urban mobility information is critical. Moovit guides you from point A to B in the easiest and most efficient way. Get train and bus times, maps, and live arrival times with ease so you can plan your trip with confidence. Find critical alerts and service disruptions for your favorite lines. Get step-by-step directions of optimal route bus, train, metro, bike or a combination of them. 
This is why Moovit has been named one of the best apps of the year 2017 by the App Store!

Moovit guides more than 865 million users in over 3200 cities throughout the world.

► Journey Planner that combines you all transport options and gives you the best route with live arrivals.

► Live Directions: Get step-by-step directions with live guidance as you travel: know exactly how long you need to walk to your station, how long you’re waiting, view the arrival time of your line and how many stops are left. 

► Real time arrivals. View real-time arrival updates, which are taken directly from GPS devices positioned on buses and trains.

► Real time alerts. Know about issues ahead of time by receiving service alerts such as emergency or unexpected disruptions, delays, traffic jams, new construction and more...

► Users reports. Moovit’s users report issues found with stations, line service, and timetables so that we can inform all nearby riders about what’s going on in their area.

► Favorite lines, stations, and places. Get easy access to lines, stations, and places you ride and visit all the time. Plus, get real-time updates if/when there are changes to your favorite lines in case your bus or train time is impacted!

► Bike routes. Get bike routes in addition to the bus, subway, train, or metro trip plans. If you ride bikes (yours or shared) we can plan a route that includes the train or bus. 
Bike docking stations are updated in real-time.

► Maps view. View all stations, routes, and lines on the subway or bus map. Additionally, maps are available in PDF for when you’re offline, or underground on the subway. 

Ride with Moovit in all major cities:

UK:
• London
• Manchester
• Birmingham
• Leeds
• Edinburgh
• Glasgow
• Liverpool
• Sheffield

Ireland:
• Dublin and all of the Republic of Ireland. 

Moovit supports all major transit:

UK:
• TFL - Bus, Tube, DLR, Overground, Ferry (River Bus), Tfl Rail, Tram, Coach
• National Express
• National Rail
• Arriva
• First
• Stagecoach and more...

Ireland:
• Bus Eireann
• Dublin Bus
• Irish Rail
• Luas
• Kenneally’s Bus Service and more…

Bike sharing provided by:
• Santander Cycles in London
• BelfastBikes in Belfast
• Bike in Bath
• Nextbike in Glasgow

India:
•Delhi: Delhi Metro (DMRC), Delhi Buses (DTC), Northern Railways (NR)
•Mumbai: Mumbai Metro (M.M.R.D.A), all buses: BEST, NMMT, KDMT, VVMT, MBMT, KMT, TMT, Ferries and more
•Bangalore: Namma Metro, B.M.T.C (buses and metro feeder routes), South Western Railways
•Chennai: Chennai Metro Rail, all buses - Metropolitan Transport Corporation (MTA)
•Ahmedabad: A.M.T.S, Bus Rapid Transport System (BRTS), V.T.C.O.S 
•Pune: Indian Railways, Pune Local Central Railways, Pune Mahanagar Parivahan Mahaman.

Singapore:
• MRT, LRT, bus, tram, cable car & shuttle buses. Service provided by:
• SBS
• SMRT
• Tower Transit
• Go-Ahead Singapore

You ride, we guide!

Feel free to contact us:

https://moovitapp.zendesk.com/hc/requests/new
moovit@Facebook, Twitter

Terms of Use
https://moovitapp.com/en-us/legal/terms-of-service-en

Are you looking for a parking app? With Saba Parking, you can manage your parking quickly and efficiently, no matter where you are. Our app helps you find, book, and pay for parking in just a few taps. Always find our car parks in the best locations, save your favourites and enjoy a range of options tailored for your needs.

Whether you're looking for a convenient parking payment app or simply an app that helps you find somewhere to park.  Saba Parking has everything you need!

Key Features: 

•  Simple Account Setup and Access: Easily create or log in to your account for quick, on-the-go access to your parking preferences and booking history.

•  Information about Car Parks: spaces, addresses and services.

•  Flexible Parking Options: Choose to park instantly, book in advance, or purchase season tickets based on your needs. 

•  Fast and Secure Payment Options: Save your credit or debit card details for an even faster checkout experience every time you park. Edit or add other cards when you need to. 

•  Personalised Parking Experience: Save your favourite car parks, making it easy to park at your most-used locations with one simple tap.

•  Comprehensive Parking Management: Track all your parking activity including current, and upcoming bookings through the app. Download invoices and manage notifications.

•  Efficient Vehicle Management: Add or edit vehicle details as needed to ensure a smooth experience every time.

With Saba Parking you can enjoy a complete, efficient, and user-friendly experience—making it your go-to parking app for finding and paying for parking.

app_name: OS Maps: Walk, Hike, Run, Bike
description:
Why OS Maps is your ultimate outdoor guide: 


EXPLORE HIKES, RUNS, WALKS OR RIDES 
We get it - your sofa is comfy, binging is fun, & the algorithm knows you a little too well. But trust us, there’s better views outside. OS Maps is here to nudge you to get your shoes on & discover just how wild (& mildly hilly) the outdoors can be. With GPS in hand, experience outdoor adventures with trusted mapping & navigation tools from the experts at Ordnance Survey. Create your own routes or enjoy ours; planned out by outdoor experts & organisations such as Trail, Country Walking, Mountain Bike UK, BBC Countryfile & more.

RUN, WALK, CYCLE, REPEAT
Whether you’re a slow stroller, a trail-chasing runner or someone who thinks bikes are just fast legs - OS Maps is your fitness & health app. Plan your days outside with our easy-to-use route plotting tools. Snap to path, save it, share it, tweak it, rewalk it - whatever gets you moving. From a lunchtime walk to a weekend expedition with friends, you’ll have all the tools to get outdoors (& brag about it later).
P.S. We double as a walking tracker, running tracker, cycle tracker & even your unofficial hype person.

ICONIC OS MAPPING
Want all the details? Subscribe to unlock the iconic OS Explorer (1:25,000) & OS Landranger (1:50,000) maps. They’re the gold standard in “not getting lost,” & yes, they're in the app. Plus, global & topographic mapping for the USA, Australia, New Zealand - because why stop at your postcode?

CREATE YOUR OWN ADVENTURES
Best in class route planning & navigation tools mean you can get off the beaten track & explore with freedom. Whether you need a running route planner, walking app or outdoor cycle guide, OS Maps has you covered. You can even turn your hike/run/ride into a masterpiece by saving it to your activity log. That means you get to relive your glory or just prove to your mates that you did actually make it up that hill.

OFFLINE MAPS? ABSOLUTELY
No signal? No stress. Feel at ease knowing you can use our biking, running, walking app freely without signal. Download your route ahead of time & roam with confidence. OS Maps keeps working in the most off-grid, WiFi-free corners of the UK. You can even export routes to your GPS device, just in case.

UNLIMITED PRINTING
Old school is still cool. Print your maps & routes if you fancy something you can fold, scribble on or accidentally sit on during lunch.

USE ON EVERY DEVICE
Start planning on your laptop, check your route on your phone & record your ramble on your Apple Watch. OS Maps syncs across all your tech. Premium members even get fancy extras like 3D mapping, aerial layers & route fly-throughs to preview the terrain.

RECOMMENDED BY EXPERTS
Ordnance Survey is a proud partner of Mountain Rescue England & Wales. Our app doesn’t just look good, it’s recommended by experts to keep you safe & on track when outside. 

SUBSCRIPTION INFO
Curious? Try OS Maps Premium free for two weeks. No pressure, just see if it sparks your sense of adventure. Subscriptions are monthly or yearly & auto-renew unless you cancel at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Prices are posted in GBP but may vary by country or when converted. Payment will be charged to Apple Account at confirmation of purchase. Full T&Cs can be found at os.uk/termsosmaps. 

KEEP YOUR PHONE ALIVE
Pro tip to saving battery: Download maps, switch to flight mode & your GPS still works (tech magic!). Turning your screen off when not in use also helps your battery last longer than your snack supply.


YOUR FEEDBACK = OUR FUEL
We’re always updating the app to add new features & squash the occasional bug. Got a suggestion or just a really good hiking pun? Leave a review or head to os.uk/contact. 
*Some AR features need a newer device (iPhone 6s, iPhone SE, iPad 2017, iPad Pro or later). Basically, if your phone isn't vintage, you're good.

Navigate London’s Tube network easily and efficiently.
Plan your best route, check live station updates, and explore official maps — all in one convenient app.

Features:

Smart route planning — find the fastest and most convenient way to your destination.

Official Tube maps — stay oriented with accurate and up-to-date London Underground maps.

Detailed directions — view each step of your trip and switch between lines effortlessly.

Live service status — stay informed about delays, closures, or line changes in real time.

Saved routes — keep your frequent trips handy for quick access.

Designed for both daily commuters and visitors, London Underground Planner helps you move around London with confidence.

Get energy effortlessly when you’re charging on the go with the bp pulse app. 
 
Our network is one of the Uk’s largest – with more than 9,000 EV charging points.
 
Register on the app and upgrade to a bp pulse subscription to:
•	Unlock your special free offer, 1 month free subscription*
•	Pay 20% less** than when you Pay as You Go with our best on the go charging tariff. 
•	Order a bp pulse charge card if you’d prefer a different way to start your charge. 
 
Or register as a free Pay as You Go user and simply add a payment card within the app wallet to get started. 
 
Both Subscribers and Pay as You Go users can use the app too: 
•	Start and stop a charge
•	Save your favourite charging points on our live map
•	Find available electric vehicle charging stations 
•	Filter by connector type and kW speed
•	Check charging history and download VAT receipts
 
Whether you’re shopping for groceries, travelling or staying in a hotel – plug in, power up and go with the bp pulse app. 
  
* Subscription is £7.85 a month collected via your chosen payment card from the second month. T&Cs of the network apply. 
**Pay on average 20% less than Contactless rates when using chargers on our standard price tariffs within the bp pulse network as available here. Savings vary by charger type (Fast = 25%, Rapid = 20%, UFC = 19% less). Rates & average subscriber savings are subject to change. 
 bp’s here for your travel needs – mostly with petrol and diesel – but bp pulse already has over 3,000 rapid and ultra-fast charging points.

Go Jauntly is a fun, free walking, nature connection and wayfinding app. We help newbies and walking enthusiasts enjoy daily outdoor adventures and more. If you're looking for short walks near me, family-friendly, dog-friendly, step-free and scenic walks in parks and cities - this is the app for you!

Follow beautifully curated photo-led walking guides or enjoy millions of circular green routes across the UK & Ireland and even from your doorstep. Use our 'Green Routes' walking map to walk the greenest, quietest, least polluted routes or from A to B, helping you to become happier and healthier on every walk.

Accessible walking challenges help to keep you active outdoors so you can celebrate wellbeing wins like boosting your mood and reducing stress. We use your HealthKit activity data to log your progress so you can collect walking stamps and badges and hit your step goals. Nature Notes encourages you to note down the “good things” in everyday nature helping to play a role in improving your wellbeing and nature connection.

Download the Go Jauntly walking app now for free and why not upgrade to unlock extra features and support our small team and mission.

Free features:
• Free access to all trails and tours made by the community and our partners.
• Enjoy the greenest walking route from A to B and enjoy unique nature filled walks or hikes straight from your doorstep.
• Use our Nature Notes feature to capture the good things you see in nature and can bring about clinically significant mental health benefits.
• Sign up to walking challenges with Apple's HealthKit and boost your physical and mental wellbeing.
• Share your favourite walking trails with the community by adding photos, directions and key points of interest for others to enjoy.

Premium subscribers
• Get 100% access to our premium curated walking routes and guided tours
• Download all our walking trails for offline use. Great for low-connectivity areas or conserving battery and data usage.
• Amble Anywhere™ works like magic. Find unique routes and hikes around new parks or nature reserves or discover unique waterside walking trails just for you. Pick a start point, we’ll find the best places to walk and share them with you.
• Personal walking challenges. Pick a target, choose a start date and get walking. Your very own tailored walking challenge at your fingertips. 
• Download the GPX files from our dynamic green routes walking map, perfect for running routes too!

RECENT PRESS:
- "Idiot-proof!" The Guardian
- "The app is really good, very very user friendly with photos and all sorts to make sure you know you're in the right place" Clare Balding on BBC's Ramblings
- "Smartphones are often accused  of absenting their users from company, but this application  has the opposite effect.” The Guardian
- "Fancy escaping the city for a stroll through the woods? This app lets you discover tailor-made walks in your area." BBC
- As seen in Vogue magazine.

OUR AWARDS:
- Highly Commended in Technology in the Marie Claire Sustainability Awards 2023
- Winner of Civic Innovation Challenge supported by The London Mayor & Transport for London
- Winner of Cities Tech for Good category from DigitalAgenda
- Webby Nominee voted top 5 Lifestyle App in the World

Using Go Jauntly outside of the UK? We have millions of walks in the app with the vast majority in the UK. We also have walks in places across the world such as Europe, Sydney, Los Angeles, Barcelona, Italy, Sri Lanka and many more destinations. We are a growing community so no matter where you are, download the app. You can even add your own favourite trails to help to spread, Happiness Outdoors!

Your subscription will automatically renew at the end of each term and your credit card will be charged through your App Store account. You can turn off auto-renew at any time through your App Store account settings. Please note that refunds for any unused portion of the term can’t be given. See more in our Terms of Use.

Bonjour RATP is the essential app for all your journeys in Île-de-France.
Plan your trips, check live traffic, purchase your tickets, and discover all mobility alternatives around you - metro, RER, bus, tram, Transilien trains, and self-service bikes.

Your routes across all networks.
Metro, RER, bus, tramway, Transilien SNCF trains, Optile… Wherever you are, Bonjour RATP finds the best journey to get you around the entire region.

Journeys tailored to you. 
Customize your search according to your preferences:
- Avoid certain lines or stations,
- Prioritize your preferred modes (metro, RER, Transilien, bus…),
- Minimize transfers or favor accessible routes.
Because every resident of Île-de-France has their own way of traveling.

Real-time traffic and personalized alerts.
Check the network status at a glance and receive real-time alerts in case of disruptions on your favorite lines across the entire Île-de-France network.

All your tickets in your pocket. 
No more monthly queues! Buy the following tickets in the app and access them directly on your iPhone or Navigo pass:
- Navigo Month
- Navigo Week
- Navigo Day
- Metro-Train-RER tickets
- Bus-Tram tickets
- Paris Region-Airports tickets
- Special tickets (Music Festival, Anti-pollution pass...)
- Paris Visite pass

Always on time.
Check real-time schedules for upcoming departures on all your lines. Never miss your bus, metro, or RER again. An incident on your lines? Thanks to alerts, you’ll be immediately informed and the app will suggest an alternative.

Speak and go (Beta)
Just say where you want to go, and Bonjour RATP takes care of the rest!
Voice search makes your journeys even easier.

Bike sharing
Want to ride? Find a bike in seconds. Bonjour RATP shows availability of Vélib’, Lime, and Dott.

Why choose Bonjour RATP?
- Complete coverage across all Île-de-France
- Customizable routes based on your preferences and habits
- Real-time traffic and alerts
- All tickets and passes directly in the app
- All self-service bikes available
- Smooth, clear, and intuitive interface

For more information about our services, feel free to contact us by email at clients@bonjour-ratp.fr

Stay in control of your EV charging experience—at home and on the go. No monthly subscription, 100% free. Winner of best EV app/software at E-Mobility Awards 2023.

Monta Charge is the digital companion for any EV lifestyle, which makes owning an electric vehicle an exciting and hassle-free ride. Whether at home or on the road, we cover all the bases, ensuring you have complete control of your charging experience. With Monta, you just need one app for all your charging needs, no matter where your journey takes you.
New to the EV lifestyle or an EV pro? Either way, you're in good hands with us. We’re here to make sure your charging experience is as seamless and convenient as possible. Just sit back and enjoy your EV; we'll take care of the rest.

Your home, your charger, your rules
An effortless EV experience starts right at home. With Monta Charge, you have the power to customise your charging settings to match your lifestyle and enjoy set-and-forget charging.
- Choose between 400 charger models that fits your needs and budget best
- Own and manage up to 3 charge points at multiple locations
- Share your charger with family, friends, and neighbours and set rules for when and who can access it
- Charge greener and cheaper: schedule charges to automatically start when electricity prices and CO2 emissions are at their lowest
- Integrate your car with Monta to see your car’s current battery level, whether the cable is plugged in, or if your car is currently charging
- Track your EV's charge history, monitor its performance, and gain insights into your energy spending and usage patterns

Your digital companion for seamless EV charging anywhere
Heading to work, running errands, or going on a road trip? Monta Charge keeps you in the driver’s seat at all times. Hit the road without hesitation, knowing you’re covered by a vast network of accessible charge points, transparent pricing, and flexible payment options.
- Quickly locate any of the 650,000+ supported public chargers on the Monta map and easily get directions with Google Maps and Apple Maps
- Filter charge points by availability, charge speed (kW), price (dynamic or fixed pricing), operator, and more
- No hidden fees, always see what you’ll pay for upfront: the price breakdown, our cut, and who sets the price
- Scan the QR code on a charger to charge your EV without registration if you’re in a hurry
- Connect to a charger via the Monta Charge app or by tapping an RFID card on the charger;
- Add funds to your Monta Wallet or simply pay via credit card, Apple Pay, Google Pay, or MobilePay/Vipps (Nordics)
- View all your transactions in one place and keep track of your charging history
- Easily export any receipts and invoices and never worry about misplaced receipts again

There for you 24/7
Looking for some help or have any questions? Don't worry, our amazing support team is just a message away, always ready to assist you whenever you need it.

Join the thriving community of over 200,000 EV enthusiasts who have seamlessly adopted the EV lifestyle with our award-winning Monta Charge app!

Seen one of our signs? Download the Horizon Spaces app to pay for your parking. 

Planning a trip? Search, book and pay for parking at thousands of UK locations; saving time, money and the environment!

The Instavolt App runs alongside our contactless payment option and provides another simple way to access our award winning DC Rapid Electric Vehicle charging network. In addition to the functional benefits the App provides (i.e. location mapping, navigation and VAT receipts), customers using our EV charging App are given exclusive access to the following rewards programs, which are not available to those using our contactless payment option.

1. Membership to the ‘Volts’ reward program, where customers can earn Volts for every kWh they use on the InstaVolt network, which can then be exchanged for charging credits.

2. Access to the ‘Invite and Earn' promotion which allows customers to earn charging credits just by referring our services to others.

3. Receive alerts to partner promotions when you start a charge at locations where one of our partners is running a special offer.

4. The amenities our locations have to offer are displayed as a collection of easily recognised icons representing the types of amenity available e.g. Cafe, Restaurant, Toilets etc.

Tube Map is the award-winning navigation app that includes the official TfL (Transport for London) Tube Map. Tube Map - London Underground works both on and offline and is the #1 Tube Map with over 22 million downloads!


Key features:


Uses the official TfL iconic Harry Beck London Underground map design.
Includes additional map views for the TfL Night Tube and Rail Network. Plus a bonus map that we have created that is more geographical. 
An easy to use journey planner that works with and without an internet connection.
Check line status for delays, closures and service changes.
See what time the next Tube is due with live departures from TfL.
National Rail arrivals and departures.
Journey planning made easy with real-time routing around closures and delays.
Use step-by-step directions in the journey planner to find your way around London.
Save your favourite routes for quick selection when on the go.
Save your Home and Work stations for up to date station, line and route information.
Find your closest Tube station wherever you are in London.
Tube Map – London Underground Apple Watch app available.
Line status widget
Travel Guide
Exclusive features also available; First & Last Tube Times, Tube Exits, Premium Line status widget and Priority Support.
NEW - Remove advertising subscription


With over 60 million downloads worldwide, there's a Mapway app for many of the busiest transport systems in the world including New York Subway, Paris Metro, Bus Times London and Berlin Subway.


Plan. Route. Relax.


Please note: whilst we endeavour to ensure that Line Status notifications are delivered in a timely manner we can’t guarantee this 100% of the time. There may be occasions when the functionality isn’t available due to technical reasons outside of our control. Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.


Tube Map Premium available as an in-app subscription: 99p weekly, £3.99 monthly or £9.99 annually, or as a one-off purchase of £24.99. Prices may vary by location. Cancel at any time, for any reason. Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, at the cost of your chosen price tier. Subscriptions can be managed and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to Account Settings in your iTunes Account. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when a subscription to that publication is purchased, where applicable. Read our terms in full at https://www.mapway.com/terms-conditions/

The GRIDSERVE app has been designed to bring additional benefits, features and functionality to regular customers of our multi-award-winning, nationwide network. All our EV chargers along the GRIDSERVE Electric Highway are already membership free and feature contactless payment, but this little sidekick will make your EV charging experience even sweeter.

Download the app for free and discover the best electric vehicle charging stations near you, with real-time information on availability, power, connector types and charging costs. You’ll also be able to view your charging curve, see all your charging history, store your receipts and even start and stop a charge from your phone.

Our favourite features:

Plan your journey
- Use our map to plan your route and find the best EV chargers
- Check live availability of our EV chargers at your chosen location
- Access hundreds of High Power EV charging locations nationwide

Check your charge
- Start, stop and pay for your charging sessions via the app
- Live charging status available at your fingertips
- Monitor the charging power, energy delivered and cost in real time

Access your receipts
- Store payment cards and pay with the app
- View your charging history in one place
- Share your charging receipts for expenses

We’ll continue to enhance and improve this app to keep the GRIDSERVE EV charging experience as awesome as possible, so we’d love to hear your feedback. Get in touch at support@GRIDSERVE.com.

China's first English map for overseas users has officially launched!
The Choice of 800 Million Navigation Users. 
Over 200 countries and territories mapped and hundreds of millions of places on the map. 
Exploring China with AMAP as your guide!

-3D lane-level views & traffic light countdown
-Get real-time traffic updates & ETAs
-Detail junction views, never miss a turn 
-See real time transit info and route options
